title: AI-Powered Virtual Tour Education for English Proficiency Enhancement in Tourism Vocational High Schools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills, understanding of fundamental tourism terminology
context.additional_context: A course aiming to cultivate practical English skills required for tourism guide roles, presupposing mobile device usage in a BYOD environment. Conducted with a focus on summative assessment

learning_goals: Through AI virtual tour simulation, learners can utilize over 80% of core English expressions required in tourism settings.
Using an AI real-time feedback system, learners can improve pronunciation, grammar, and vocabulary accuracy by over 40%.
Learners' ability to provide context-specific English guidance is evaluated using a three-level assessment criteria through interaction scenarios with virtual tourists.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
